mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EQUIPMENT_INFO WHERE EQUIP_CODE = #{equipCode}

SELECT EI.EQUIP_ID, EI.EQUIP_CODE, EI.EQUIP_NAME, EI.STD_CAPACITY, EI.ACTIVE_YN, EI.MAINTENANCE_HR, EI.DAILY_CAPACITY, EI.DETAIL_CODE, CD.DETAIL_NAME FROM EQUIPMENT_INFO EI LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL CD ON EI.DETAIL_CODE = CD.DETAIL_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND LOWER(EI.EQUIP_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%'
AND EI.DETAIL_CODE = #{detailCode}
ORDER BY EI.EQUIP_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE EQUIPMENT_INFO SET EQUIP_CODE = #{equipCode}, EQUIP_NAME = #{equipName}, STD_CAPACITY = #{stdCapacity}, ACTIVE_YN = #{activeYn}, MAINTENANCE_HR = #{maintenanceHr}, DAILY_CAPACITY = #{dailyCapacity}, DETAIL_CODE = #{detailCode} WHERE EQUIP_ID = #{equipId}
mapper.select: SELECT DETAIL_CODE, DETAIL_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE CODE_ID IN ('PCD', 'SGD') AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE_ID, DETAIL_CODE
